means: 好心肠的，宽大的，体谅的

sentence.Network_en: The thinking is good-hearted, but muddled and fundamentally unsound.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个想法的出发点是好的，但是条理混乱，而且本质上是错误的。

sentence.Network_en: To her, and indeed to all the world, he was a nice , good - hearted man.
sentence.Network_cn: 像人们普遍的看法一样,她认为他是个热心肠的好人.

sentence.Network_en: And then this morning, all he did was to play the kind good - hearted mediator!
